summary: Vijay is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as his lookalike Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. Things go wrong when the officer is killed and Vijay is left to fend for himself.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Priyanka Chopra|Arjun Rampal|Isha Koppikar|Boman Irani|Om Puri|Pavan Malhotra|Rajesh Khattar|Tanay Chheda|Kareena Kapoor|Chunky Pandey|Diwakar Pundir|Sandrine Verrier Seth|Sidhart Jyoti|Shamsher Sidhu|Shakeel Khan|Nor Zamshuri Ramli|Shaharuddin Thamby|Aman Shah Abu Kassim|Rahim Omar|Darleep Singh|Kuldeep Sareen|Raakesh Maudgal|Micky Makhija|Nishith Ranjan|Bikramjeet Kanwarpal|Vijayanthi Iyer|Avani Batra|Naeim Ghalili|Nissar Khan|Yasmin Isa|Haflin Saiful|Greg Gasson|Akhil Mishra|Jayant Gadekar|Shakun Batra|Satyajit Sharma|Ravinderdeep Sikandar|Leeyawchoy|Yusof B. keywords: bound and gagged|cleave gag|character name as title|bad guy wins|malaysia
title: Don
